property.name: Card Text
property.value:
OBSESS COST: Pay 2. EFFECT: This turn, this card gains " PROVIDES: [O][O][O] ".
[O][O][O][O][O][O]: This card gains COVERT.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: conduit of compulsion

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
COST: Pick a non-resource card.
EFFECT: Put the card on the top of its owner's deck.
RECUR: [O][O][O] COST: Use this only if this card is in your discard pile. Pay 3. Pick a character. Remove this card from the game. EFFECT: Put the character into its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: on the frontier of focus Take a picture, it'll last longer!

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
UNIQUE CONTIGUOUS DEFALCATING MACHINE
If a character enters play, its controller must choose one of the following:
OPTION 1 Put a resource they control into its owner’s hand.
OPTION 2 Destroy that character.
OPTION 3 Their faction loses 3 influence.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: not quite what it sounds like ...but exactly what it means.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: If this card is destroyed, put it into its owner's hand, then discard a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: adorably horrible Little Suzy suspected that today would have been a good day to stay home from the Arcanology Academy.

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
Choose one of the following as this card's rules text:
OPTION 1 COST: Your opponent may detach up to 3 resources. EFFECT: You may search your deck for an Arcanist character and reveal it. If you do, put it into your hand.
OPTION 2 COST: Choose a number for X. Deplete X characters you control. EFFECT: Detach X+3 resources from your faction.
OPTION 3 COST: Pick a character. EFFECT: This turn, the character gains COVERT.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: is that a bear? A group of bad men looking for a very bad thing.

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
COST: Pick an opponent. Look at that player’s face-down resources and pick one.
EFFECT: You may destroy that card. If you do, that player may draw a card and may play a resource.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: an appendaged afterthought

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
This card cannot be picked.
All characters in your hand gain TACTICAL.
[O][O][O][O][O][O][O][O]: All items and locations in your hand gain TACTICAL.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: the arcane crossing An invisible bridge stretches the passage between mainland Clockman and the isolated towers of the Clockman Arcanology Branch

property.name: Card Text
property.value: If this card restores, it gains COVERT this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: hoarse hunter of horrors The wastelands of Lugubria were never hospitable, but decades of voidal pollution have made them host to many dangerous monsters. In a strange twist, the arcanists have begun to find uses for these beasts and will pay bounties to anyone foolish enough to pursue them. He who fights with monsters might take care lest he thereby become a monster.

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
This card gains 1 strength and 1 life for each face-down resource each opponent controls.
FOLLOW SUIT COST: Pay 3. Pick an opponent. EFFECT: That player puts a card from their hand face-down as a resource under their control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: distant relative of the land shark The blur is intentional, we know there are just some things you can’t un-see…

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
ATTACH to character
The attached character cannot attack and has no rules text.
MOVE COST: Pick a character that is not in battle. Pay 3. EFFECT: Attach this card to the character.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: can't brain so good today I dumb!?

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
When this card comes into play, on your next turn, skip your faction’s RESTORE RULE.
[V][V][V][V]: This card loses all other rules text.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: ennui embodied The Thabbashite mages of Lugubria have been known to "enlist" the services of horrific creatures of titanic proportions to do their bidding.

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
If this card attacks, pick an opponent. That player discards a card.
[O][O][O][O][O][O]: If this card inflicts battle damage to an opponent’s faction, that faction’s owner discards a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: please look here There was no ectoplasmic voidal horror, only a pocket of swamp gas that reflected the light of a celestial sphere.

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
COST: If you control at least [O][O][O], you may pick a character or a location.
When this card enters play, if you picked a character or location as part of its cost and the character has strength 3 or less or the location has structure 3 or less, put that card into its owner’s hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: more offensive than official but less officious than offensive.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: hargantuan gorror Don’t kill it… it just wants to hug its mommy!

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
This card enters play with a token on it.
OBSCURE COST: Remove a token from this card. Pick a character. EFFECT: This turn, the character gains COVERT.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: look what I had for breakfast Being able to actually see inside people was a massive step forward in Luridian medicine - and Imperical torture.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Each player picks a character they own and puts it into their hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: whoops

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
COST: Pick a player. That player may pay 2. If they do, look at the top card of your deck then terminate this card.
EFFECT: The picked player cannot play characters this turn. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: glomp There's been a change of priorities.

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
COST: Pick 3 characters. Any opponent may pay 3. If they do, look at the top 3 cards of your deck and put them back in any order then terminate this card.
EFFECT: Destroy each picked character with 3 strength or less.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: touch them with toxins They try to teach the truth through the training of threes.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: DELINIATE: [V][V] COST: Pay 2. Deplete this card. Choose a threshold type. X is that type. EFFECT: This turn, each face-down resource that doesn't have "PROVIDES X", gains "PROVIDES X".

property.name: Flavor
property.value: the living gods call for potent magics

card.name: The Lugubrian Council of Quotidian Affairs

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
UNIQUE COUNCIL
CONVENE COST: Pay 2. Discard 2 cards. EFFECT: Put 2 tokens on this card.
CAST VOTE COST: Pay 2. Remove 2 tokens from this card. EFFECT: Search your deck for a tactic and reveal it. Put it into your hand.
PASS COST: Pay 2. Discard a tactic from your hand. X is that tactic's numeric cost. Pick an opponent's character with strength X or less. EFFECT: Put the character into its owner's hand. That character's controller may detach up to X resources from their faction.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: we need a god to study and exploit... all in favor say “aye”!

card.name: This, That, and the Other Thing

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
COST: Pick 3 tactics in your discard pile.
EFFECT: Shuffle 1 card into your deck. Put 1 card into play under your control as a face-down resource. Put 1 card into your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: too much pot spoils the cook Ooh! one of these, and one of those… Yuck! that one is rotten.

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
COST: Pick a character. That character's controller my detach up to 2 resources.
EFFECT: This turn, the character loses 6 strength. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: the fix is in Sometimes the Mau have the right idea. (but don’t tell them we said that!)

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
COVERT
When this card enters play, each opponent may detach up to 3 resources from their faction.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: disloyal devourer What the hell man? Same team, same team!

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
COST: Pick an opponent.
EFFECT: That opponent discards 2 cards. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: this may sting a little

property.name: Card Text
property.value: AUGUR COST: Deplete this card. Choose a number for X that is 3 or less. Pick an opponent. That opponent may detach up to X resources from their faction. EFFECT: Look at the top X cards of your deck. You may put one of those cards on the top of your deck. Put the remaining cards on the bottom of your deck in any order.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: not sure what it does

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
UNIQUE A & D LAW
Characters with numeric cost 2 or less cannot attack.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: exactly as advertised Have you or a loved one recently got blowed up? If so, visit the offices of Dewey, Cheatem, and Howe. Get what's yours!

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
If you would discard a card, you may remove it from the game face-down instead.
You may look at cards removed from the game by this card.
If you would draw a card as part of your Develop Rule, you may put a card removed from the game by this card into its owner's hand instead.
WITHDRAW COST: Pay 1. EFFECT: Draw a card. Discard 2 cards.
FLIP UP: 1 [G][G]

property.name: Flavor
property.value: keep it secret, keep it safe

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
COST: Pick a character.
EFFECT: That character’s controller chooses a number for X. Choose one: That player’s faction loses X influence, or destroy the picked character and your faction loses X+X influence.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: whatever the market will bear Buy when it whines, sell when it roars.

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
Look at the top 8 cards of your deck. You may choose a character among them with 1 strength or less and reveal it. If you do, put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck.
FLIP UP: 3 [G]

property.name: Flavor
property.value: a red carpet reception… ...of Questionable Morality.

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
COST: Pick a character.
EFFECT: That character’s owner puts a resource they control into its owner’s hand. Flip the character face down under its owner’s control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: sleep with the fishes

property.name: Subtype
property.value: mau, pacifist

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
All damage assigned to this card by characters with items attached to them is reduced to 0.
TRANSCEND COST: Pay 5. EFFECT: This turn, this card gains COVERT.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: agnostic ascetic Money is a terrible master, but an excellent servant.

property.name: Subtype
property.value: eustace, blade of questionable morality

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
UNIQUE EUSTACE
FUTURE IMPLICATIONS COST: Pay 2. Your faction loses 1 influence. EFFECT: Draw a card.
PAST TREPIDATIONS COST: Discard a card. EFFECT: This turn, this card gains 1 life. If the discarded card was a resource, this card also gains 1 strength this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: the littlest litigator

property.name: Flavor
property.value: he didn’t make it to the semi-finals Fighting the fight, swinging the sword. He slipped in the gore, a master no more. He haunts the arena just looking for fights, missing the cheers, the blood and the spotlights.

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
UNIQUE CHARM If a player would search their deck you may pay 1 instead. If you do, draw a card and then that player searches their deck.
SERAPHIM FUSION COST: Pay 4. Pick a character you control with "UNIQUE Eustace". Destroy this card. EFFECT: Search your deck for a card named "Siluriformes Flaxenscale" and put it into play.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: draconic disc

property.name: Subtype
property.value: mau, employee

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
RAISE CAPITAL COST: Pay 1. Discard a card. EFFECT: This turn, this card gains " PROVIDES: [G][G][G] ".
INVEST: [G][G][G][G][G][G] COST: Pay 2. EFFECT: Search your deck for a resource and reveal it. Put it into your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: doing god's work The first thing you need to know about Goldmau Sacks is that it's everywhere. Clockman's most powerful investment bank is a great vampire squid wrapped around the face of humanity, relentlessly jamming its blood funnel into anything that smells like money.

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
If this card is destroyed, each opponent must destroy a character they control.
HARASH: [V][V][V] COST: Use this only if this card is in your discard pile and only during your turn. Pay 1. Destroy a face-down resource you control. EFFECT: Put this card into play under your control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: the living gods call for acceptance of death The original Hashshashin.

property.name: Subtype
property.value: mau, assassin

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
COST: Inflict 2 damage to a location you own or pay 3.
Locations you control gain 1 structure.
PROSTRATE COST: Deplete a location you control. Pick a character. EFFECT: Deplete that card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: assume the position Who's your momma?!!

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
ATTACH to character
Attached character gains 2 life.
COUGH UP: [G][G][G] COST: Destroy this card. EFFECT: Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: it really captures the fluffiness, you know? Being good in business is the most fascinating kind of art. Making money is art and working is art and good business is the best art.

property.name: Subtype
property.value: mau, bureaucrat

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
When this card enters play, you may search your deck for a staple resource, reveal it, and put it into your hand.
If this card is destroyed, you may draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: conniving and cunning Always looking for the next task to increase his own bank account. He will risk it all just for a little more profit, even if “it all”, isn’t his ‘it all” to risk.

property.name: Subtype
property.value: pluck, grifter

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
UNIQUE PLUCK
When this card enters play, you may remove a card in your discard pile from the game. If you do, draw a card.
GOOD DEAL COST: Deplete this card. Pick 2 cards of the same type in your discard pile. Remove them from the game. EFFECT: Search your deck for a card with the same type as the picked cards and reveal it. If you do, put it into your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: only finds what you didn't know you needed

property.name: Subtype
property.value: mau, merchant

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When this card enters play, you may pick a character. If you do, this turn, that character gains 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: it's dangerous to go alone, take this Buy something, will ya?

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
COST: Pick an opponent. You may pay 1. If you do, that opponent may pay 1. Repeat this cost until you or your opponent does not pay.
EFFECT: Each player draws cards equal to the amount they paid.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: more talking than I care to discuss “Ten.” “Sixty.” “Twenty.” “Forty five.” “Thirty two and three quarters.” “Thirty six and not a micromajig less.” “Thirty three and I’ll toss in my grandmother’s corpse.” “Isn’t she alive?” “Presently.”

property.name: Subtype
property.value: mercenary, mau

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
If this card attacks, restore it at the end of the battle.
This card can only attack once each turn.
PROTECT COST: Deplete this card. Pick a character. EFFECT: This turn, the character gains 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: big enough for two

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
This card gains 1 strength and 1 life for each token on it.
PUSH OVERBOARD AND LOOT COST: Pay 1. Destroy a character you own. EFFECT: Put a token on this card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: fly the unfriendly skies Hey can I see your watch? Whoa! Look at that fish!

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
When this card enters play, you may draw a card.
If a character goes to a discard pile, any player may pay 4 to put that card on top of its owner's deck.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: reduce, reuse, reanimate It just so happens that your friend here is only "MOSTLY dead." There's a big difference between "mostly dead" and "all dead." "Mostly dead" is slightly alive. With "all dead," well, with "all dead" there's usually only one thing you can do: go through his clothes and look for loose change.

property.name: Subtype
property.value: siluriformes, seraphim, dragon

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
UNIQUE SILURIFORMES
All UNIQUE Eustace gain 3 strength and 3 life.
NUMISMATIC EMISSION COST: Pay 5. EFFECT: Draw 2 cards. Gain 2 influence.
AURIFEROUS AUGMENTAION COST: Discard 2 cards. EFFECT: This turn, this character gains 2 strength and 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: avarice incarnate

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
COST: Your opponents cannot respond to this card.
EFFECT: Each opponent must attach a resource to their faction. Draw a card. Discard a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: steal of the century There's a sucker born every minute.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: BLOOD GOLD: [V][V] COST: Pay 2. Lose 1 influence. EFFECT: You may play a card as a face-down resource.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: the living gods call for riches The value of gold transcends culture.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: If this card is blocked by an opposing party of 2 or more characters, it loses 1 speed this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: don’t be such a pussy Kitty gonna cry? Big kitty gonna cry?

property.name: Card Text
property.value: DIRTY DEALS COST: Pay 2. Pick a location you own and inflict 1 damage to it. EFFECT: Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: congregation of the criminally-inclined Whatcha buyin’, stranger?

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
COST: Choose a number for X. Discard X cards. Pay X - 2.
EFFECT: Draw X cards.
FINE PRINT: [G][G][G][G] COST: Reveal this card from your hand. Your faction loses 2 influence. Pay 2. EFFECT: Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: cleverly concealed clause

property.name: Card Text
property.value: If this card is restored, put a Micromajig token into play under your control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: 50 M4ny M4j195! If we could build enough of these, we might just be able to sneak out of this place!

property.name: Card Text
property.value: At the start of your turn, you may pay 3. If you do you may play a resource.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: technological treasure trove Buried deep beneath layers of Clockman’s history, it is not clear who had built it or why. The archives in Acrolos had no record of this place, but yet they found Kaiser prototypes, node terminals, all manner of the most advanced voidal technologies. The greatest prize of all, however, was the Testudine. Surely that was what the Emperor’s ghost had meant for them to find.

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
At the start of your turn you may pay 1 for each token on this card. If you don't, destroy this card.
At the end of your turn put a token on this card.
FEED COST: Pay 3. EFFECT: Remove a token from this card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: MOAR! OM NOM NOM NOM

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
When this card enters play, you may search your deck for an item and reveal it. If you do, put it into play as a face-down resource.
TRASH: [E][E][E][E][E][E] COST: Pay 1. Pick an item. Destroy this card. EFFECT: Destroy that card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: ooh, a thing!

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
UNIQUE DRACONIC LUTEDODERM SUIT
The attached character gains 2 strength and 2 life.
If any other "gear" card is played, you may draw a card.
SERAPHIM FUSION COST: Use this only if this card is attached to a UNIQUE JO. Pay 3. Destroy this card. EFFECT: Search your deck for a card named "Testudine Autoframe" and put it into play.
EQUIP COST: Pick a character. If it is a UNIQUE JO then X is 0, otherwise X is 2. Pay X. EFFECT: Attach this card to the character.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: fits like a glove. an ichorous, bloodthirsty, vengeful glove

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
CRUNCH COST: Destroy a Micromajig token you control. EFFECT: This turn, this card gains " PROVIDES: [E][E][E] ".
[E][E][E][E][E][E]: This card gains 2 strength and 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: above the fray Be the 1%.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Destroy all items and locations.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: yes, yes it is

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
RAAR! COST: Use this only if this card is not a character and only once each turn. Pay 1. EFFECT: This turn, this card gains the "character" type, and gains 2 strength, 2 life, and 3 speed.
HIDE! COST: Pay 1. EFFECT: If this card is a character, it loses the "character" type. Deplete this card.
INTO THE RABBIT HOLE… COST: Pay 3. EFFECT: Flip this card face-down under its owner's control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: terrifyingly cute

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
This card cannot be picked by non-item cards or non-item abilities.
Opponents cannot take control of this card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: precisely as advertised GG sir… GG!

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
COST: Pick an item.
EFFECT: Destroy the item. Put a Micromajig token into play under your control.
FLIP UP: 2 [E][E]

property.name: Flavor
property.value: don't just sit there looking shiny Oh, I'm sorry, did you need that to do something helpful?

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
COST: Pick an item you control. Pick a character.
EFFECT: Put the cards into their owner's hand.
FLIP UP: 2 [E]

property.name: Flavor
property.value: see what we did there? It just works on so many levels.

property.name: Subtype
property.value: jo, blade of questionable morality

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
UNIQUE JO
Each character you control gains: "RESEARCH COST: Use this only if this card has been in play since the start of the turn. Deplete this card. EFFECT: Reduce the next numeric cost you pay this turn by 1.·

property.name: Flavor
property.value: best communicator in Acrolos Jo was born and raised on the island-complex of Acrolos, which raises the question of where she managed to learn any kind of social graces. She now provides technology in bulk so the rich can resell each piece to the highest warmongering bidder.

property.name: Subtype
property.value: mechanic, 31f

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
When this card enters play, you may pay 2. If you do, you may put a token on up to 2 different non-resource cards.
While there is a token on this card, it gains 2 strength and 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: manic machine manipulator

property.name: Card Text
property.value: At the start of your turn, you may choose a number for X and destroy X Micromajig tokens you control. If you do, reduce the next numeric cost you pay this turn by X+1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: preserving Lugubria for a better tomorrow This product made with at least 60% post-consumer majig parts.

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
RELEASE THE MAJIGS! COST: Deplete this card. Pick an opponent. That player may put a Micromajig token into play under their control. This turn, all damage inflicted to that token is reduced to 0. EFFECT: Put a Micromajig token into play under your control.
PREPARE COST: Pay 2. EFFECT: Restore this card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: I swear they're breeding or something

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
The attached character gains 1 strength and 1 life.
If a Micromajig token or "horsemajig" character enters play under your control, you may attach this card to it.
PWNED COST: Pick a Micromajig token or "horsemajig" character that this card is attached to. Pick a character. Destroy this card. EFFECT: Inflict 7 damage to the picked characters.
MOVE COST: Pick a character you control. Pay 3. EFFECT: Attach this card to the character if you can.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: tiny equine explosives Friendship is tragic.

property.name: Subtype
property.value: guardforce, 31f

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
This card can attack even if it has not been in play under your control since the start of your turn.
When this card enters play, you may pay 2. If you do, put a token on it.
While there is a token on this card, it gains 1 strength and 1 life.
P3PP3R 61457 COST: Remove a token from this card. Use this only once per turn. EFFECT: This turn, this character gains 1 strength and 1 life. Restore it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: screw the rules - i has an awesome suit

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
COST: Pick a character.
EFFECT: Restore that character. This turn, it cannot attack.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: i’ll get it up and working again! To help close a deal that was quickly going south, Jo offered her skillful services to Eustace by restoring his broken majig.

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
TACTICAL
NO EJECT! COST: Pick a character you own. Pick a character your opponent controls. Destroy this card. EFFECT: Destroy the characters. If either character was a member of an opponent's attacking party, destroy all characters in that party.
FLIP UP: 4 [E][E]

property.name: Flavor
property.value: don't try this at home… ...unless you sign a waiver first.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: At start of your turn you may pay 4. If you do and you control atleast 2 face-down resources, pick an opponent. That player must pick a face-down resource you control. If the face-down resource is a character or an item you may play it for free. (You still need to meet its threshold and satisfy its extra costs.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: looks down on everyone The Runic Junker has many trunks, and Jo has junk in every one of them.

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
This card enters play with 2 tokens on it. If there are no tokens on this card destroy it.
PLAN COST: Pay 1. Remove a token from this card. EFFECT: Search your deck for a card named "Elitism" and reveal it. Put it into your hand.
FOLLOW PLAN COST: Pay 2. Remove a token from this card. EFFECT: You may play a resource.
NEW PLAN COST: Destroy a face-down resource you control. EFFECT: Add a token to this card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: we only have one chance to get there, well maybe two

property.name: Card Text
property.value: PAY OFF COST: Any player may use this ability. Pay 1. EFFECT: This turn, if damage is inflicted to a character or faction by this card, reduce the amount by 1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: arch nemesis of rockem bot

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
If this card would be destroyed, flip it face-down under its owner's control instead.
If this card is flipped down, each opponent's faction gains 1 influence and you may put a Micromajig token into play under your control for each influence gained this way.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: silent and ruthless

property.name: Subtype
property.value: testudine, seraphim, dragon

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
UNIQUE TESTUDINE
When this card enters play, you may remove a UNIQUE JO you control from the game. If you do, this turn, each other character you control gains 1 strength and 1 life.
All characters you control can attack even if they have not been in play under your control since the start of the turn.
If this card leaves play, put a UNIQUE JO that was removed from the game by this card into play under your control.

property.value: smarter than your average luteoderm

property.value:

property.value: screw you guys, I'm going home Look! Over there! A distraction!

TACTICAL
COST: If you played this card during an opponent’s turn you may pay 1. If you don’t, terminate it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: surprisingly effective against giants too!

property.name: Subtype
property.value: pluck, drunk

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
UNIQUE Pluck
The top card of each opponents' deck is revealed at all times. If any of those cards are a character, this card gains 3 speed.
CHUG! COST: Pay 2. Pick an opponent. EFFECT: Put the top card of that player's deck on the bottom of their deck.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: bottomless imbiber of booze The liver is evil and it must be punished. Sobriety is the enemy.

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
COST: Pick a character.
EFFECT: Put a token on the character. Destroy it if it has at least X tokens on it, where X is its numeric cost.
RECUR: [D][D] COST: Use this only if this card is in your discard pile. Pay 4. Remove this card from the game. Pick a character. EFFECT: Put 2 tokens on the character. Destroy it if it has at least X tokens on it, where X is its numeric cost.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: once a drug, now a nuisance

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
TACTICAL
When this card enters play you may add it to your attacking or blocking party. All characters in that party gain 1 speed.
When this card enters play you may pick a character. If you do, put a token on that card.

property.value: specialist in chicanery and showmanship

UNIQUE CICIBEO
TACTICAL
COST: Discard a non-resource Rogue card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: deft hands, swift feet Excellent dancer, better pickpocket.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: This turn, characters you control gain 1 strength and 1 life and characters your opponents control lose 1 strength and 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: oh, I say! It's a blindfold kick back type of a game Called the Clockman City Shuffle. Whereas you look left and they fall right Into the Clockman City Shuffle. It's a they-think you-think they don't know type of Clockman city hustle. Where you take your time,

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
COST: Pick a character that inflicted damage to your faction this turn.
EFFECT: Remove that character from the game.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: hooters, honkers, jibbly-jubblies! In other news, tits!

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
HOWL COST: Destroy a card named "Deception" you own. EFFECT: Put a token on this card.
PROWL COST: Remove a token from this card. EFFECT: This turn, this card gains COVERT.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: he ain’t nothing like a hound dog

property.name: Subtype
property.value: gang member

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
This card enters play with 2 tokens on it.
This card gains 1 strength for each token on it.
DELIVERY COST: Remove a token from this card. Deplete this card. Reveal a face-down "gear" card you control. EFFECT: You may play it even if you cannot meet its threshold. If its numeric cost is 4 or less, you may play it for free.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Maybe I got something for you, eh? You can never be too rich, too good looking, or too well armed!

property.name: Flavor
property.value: tastes like chicken smells like a three day old corpse stuffed with garlic and bear poop

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
COST: Pick a character.
EFFECT: Choose one of the following as this card's effect:
OPTION 1 This turn, the character loses 1 numeric cost. Draw a card.
OPTION 2 This turn, the character gains 1 numeric cost. Draw a card.
OPTION 3 This turn, the character gains 1 speed. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: disappearances can be deceiving Does putting on dem shades really help that much?!

property.name: Subtype
property.value: martial artist

property.name: Card Text
property.value: If you control more characters than any opponent, this card cannot be picked.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: lacks discipline - leaks ice cream Teacher say, student do. Well, not always.

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
COVERT
If this card is put into a discard pile from play, you may pick a character, item, or location. If you do, remove that card from the game.
KLEPT: [D][D][D][D][D][D][D][D][D][D] COST: Pay 4. Pick a character or item. EFFECT: Take control of that card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: steals anything he can, even life Some Clockman criminals are licensed professionals. Others are less... legitimate.

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
TACTICAL
If this card inflicts damage to a character, that character does not restore during its controller's next RESTORE RULE.
FLIP UP: 3 [D][D]

property.name: Flavor
property.value: prize fighter. literally.

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
TACTICAL
COST: You may remove up to 4 cards in an opponent's discard pile from the game. If you do, reduce this card's numeric cost by the number of cards removed.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: theft from any direction For any client.

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
While this card is in your hand and there is a location in play, this card gains tactical.
This card ignores all rules text on locations. (this card cannot be picked by locations and any effects from locations do not affect this card.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: felonious freerunner ·"Obstacles are found everywhere, and in overcoming them we nourish ourselves.·

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
ATTACH to character you control
The attached character gains 2 strength.
UNFOLD COST: Pay 2. Deplete the attached character. Reveal the top card of your deck. EFFECT: If the revealed card has a numeric cost of 5 or higher, all characters your opponents control lose 1 life. If the revealed card has a numeric cost of 0-4, destroy the attached character. If the revealed card is a resource, destroy the attached character and destroy all characters your opponents control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: a multitude of bad choices You hold it like this… Or maybe like this? Wait!? No coffee machine?

property.name: Flavor
property.value: nearly immortal invalid While sarcophyles are resilient against most ailments, they are strangely vulnerable to a few, such as anemia.

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
COST: Play this only during a battle. Deplete a character you control that is not in a battle party.
EFFECT: Add the character you depleted to an attacking or blocking party you control. It gains 1 speed this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: a classic

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
TACTICAL
ATTACH to item
When this card enters play, flip a coin. If you win, take control of the attached item. If you lose, put this card into its owner's hand.
If this card leaves play, the attached item's owner takes control of the item.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: for all your sticky stealy needs

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
Choose one of the following as this card's rules text:
OPTION 1 COST: Pick a player. This turn, that player may not play cards using FLIP UP. EFFECT: Look at the top card of any deck.
OPTION 2 COST: Pick a character. EFFECT: This turn, that character gains COVERT. Draw a card.
OPTION 3 COST: Pick a "gear" card. Pick a character. EFFECT: Attach the "gear" card to the character. This turn, the "gear" card loses all abilities.

If a character you control with 3 speed or less attacks, restore it at the end of the battle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: wretched hive of scum and villainy Butcher in front, don't ask about the back.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: If this character inflicts battle damage to a faction, put the top X cards of that opponent’s deck into their discard pile where X is the amount of damage inflicted by this character. You may pick an item with X or less numeric cost and destroy it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: unctuous urchin

property.value:
UNIQUE SKYDOCKS
BUSINESS DAY COST: Pay 1. Deplete this card. Choose a resource icon. EFFECT: Reduce the threshold requirement of the next card you play by 1 of the chosen resource icon.
OVERTIME: [V][V][V][V][V] COST: Pay 2. Deplete this card. Choose a resource icon. EFFECT: Reduce the threshold requirement of the next card you play by up to 6 of the chosen resource icon.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: look to the skies One of the few places where it’s just about getting it done.

card.name: Remains of Foreman Pete, the Clock Man

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
UNIQUE FOREMAN PETE
CLOCK IN: [V][V][V] COST: Discard a staple resource. Pay 2. EFFECT: Draw a card.
WORK IT: [V][V] COST: Pick a face-down resource you control. Pay 2. EFFECT: Put that card into your hand. You may play a resource.
CLOCK OUT: [V] COST: Flip this card face-down under its owner's control. EFFECT: Detach a resource from your faction.

property.value: forgotten relic of a buried past Few residents of Clockman have ever seen their city's namesake.

COST: Pick a character you control.
If the picked character would be dealt damage, deal damage to this card instead. If the picked character would leave play, this character leaves play in that way instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: see also: burly, beefy, and bulging Please allow me to introduce my associates, Max Deltoid and Chunk McSlabmeats.

property.value:

EFFECT: Inflict X damage to the character, where X is the location's structure. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Geronimo! You do not need a parachute to B.A.S.E. Jump. You only need a parachute to B.A.S.E. Jump twice.

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
GO TIME! COST: Deplete this card. EFFECT: Shuffle your deck and then reveal the top card. If the revealed card is a character, put that card into play, otherwise put it on the bottom of your deck. The character can attack even if it has not been in play under your control since the start of the turn. If that character leaves play or is in play at the end of the turn, remove it from the game.
AT ANY COST! COST: Pay 2. Inflict 3 damage to this card. EFFECT: Restore this card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: beats to the march of his own drum Can't you hear it? I thought it would stop, but it never does. Never, ever stops. Inside my head... it's everywhere. Listen, listen, listen!

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
TACTICAL
COST: Play this only not during a battle.
When this card enters play, pick another character. At the start of the next turn that character gains 3 strength for that turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: right in the butt You know what? This is weird. Really, really weird. We’re seriously creeped out. Like, not even sure why we did this. We’re sorry. No, really.

property.value:
If a card that provides at least [R] enters play under your control, you may put a token on this card.
This card gains 1 strength and 1 life for each token on it.

property.value: thoroughly excessive Flyswatter of Doom? Check! Hockey Stick of Holes? Check! Midget Glaive? Check! Trident of Spaghetti? Check! Bubble Blower of Gold? Check! Glove of Awesome! Check! Piles of Bodies? Check! Hoop of Stuff? Check! Thing k! Belt of Bullets? Check! Dude with Arrows of Doom?

EFFECT: Inflict X+1 damage to the character.

property.value: round one... fight! Like a food fight, except the only thing on the menu are knuckle sandwiches.

property.value:
This card enters play with 3 tokens on it.
At the start of your turn put a token on this card.
If there are at least 6 tokens on this card, destroy it and each opponents' faction loses 6 influence.
If there are no tokens on this card destroy it.
CONTROL THE FLAME! COST: Any player may use this ability. Destroy a character or item you control. EFFECT: Add or remove a token from this card.

This character gains 1 strength for each depleted warlord character you control.

property.value: virulent outbreak of violence ·"ahm.. from this day to the... ahm... ending of the world... ahm... or... ahm... tomorrow or something... we shall be remembered or... uh, Anyway... We few, we happy few, we band of brothers... ahm... or cousins... or other relatives... Anyway... I am sur
